0.text: Bug 21834  Coolbar - deleting items corrupting layout.

4.text: Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).

6.text: Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on first row) to the second row, put  it after the Open Type item.

8.text: Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, put it after the Launch coolitem.

10.text: Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on first row), put  it after the Search coolitem.

13.text: This will delete the first item on the second  row.

14.text: Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs.

19.text: Drag the Script coolitem to the second row.

21.text: Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, put it after the Script item.

23.text: Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, put it after the Launch coolitem.

25.text: Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, put it after the Search  coolitem.

28.text: This will delete the first item on the second  row.

29.text: Notice that the Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete  occurs.

30.text: The Launch item should stay on the second row.
